Content.hotel:Description: The Novotel Paris Est hotel is a 4 star hotel located 10 minutes away from the Grande Halle de la Villette, 20 minutes from the Saint Denis business district and Villepinte and Le Bourget exhibition centers. Quick access to Roissy and Orly airports. Justoutside the hotel, the metro provides quick access to the center of Paris in 15 minutes. The hotel has a restaurant, bar, fitness center and business center with a theater accommodating up to 650 people. Free WIFI and paying indoor car park.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Superior - 1 double bed and 1 sofa bed

PromotionalInfo.customerFulfillmentRequirements: Free night and breakfast for 2 children under 16, in parents' room
PromotionalInfo.shortMarketingText: 2 children under 16 STAY FREE in parents' room
PromotionalInfo.termsAndConditions: Free night and breakfast for 2 children under 16, in parents' room

Content.hotel:Description: Hotel with a new Concept In Paris, the theme of Champagne. Decoration, Furniture, all remind Champagne. And a certain Lifestyle and much of Feminity in design. Each floor will evoke a particular world and it's relationship with Champagne. Oenology Classes exclusively on the Champagne will be organized. Between two glasses of Champagne, you can also relax in our Espace Bien Etre. If you want an unique experience of Luxury and Lifestyle Made in France, Be the First !!

Located in the heart of Paris, close to the Louvre Museum, the Opera House and the Champs-Elysees avenue, this new Boutique Hotel is set in an 18th century private mansion. The 15 Suites were designed by the renowned interior designer Michele Bonan who succeeded in creating a place of distinct luxury with the unique atmosphere of a private home. MARQUIS FAUBOURG SAINT-HONORE offers impeccable amenities and attentionate service. Each Suite includes a dressing area, a bar area, an Italian Carrare marble bathroom with heated floors, Hermes vanities, a flat-screen 40-inch LED television, complimentary satellite international channels, an interactive system, a Mac mini with infra-red keyboard, complimentary high-speed Internet access broadband and WiFi. Direct phone line upon request.

hotel:Amenities.hotel:Amenity: Public areas wheelchair accessible for disabled

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Executive Suite - 1 double bed and 1 sofa bed

Content.hotel:Description: Located above the Forum des Halles and overlooking the church of Saint Eustache, Citadines Prestige Les Halles Paris enjoys a privileged location in the center of the capital. On foot or by subway, walk to the likings of your desires in the sites closest to the residence such as the Centre Pompidou, the Conciergerie or the Notre Dame and the Louvre. The hotel offers 189 units on 7 floors. All units are air conditioned and feature a bathroom with hairdryer, a fully equipped kitchen with stove, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, TV with satellite channels, a direct dial telephone, a safe and a free WIFI access. Pets are allowed: 10 euros per animal and per day. Citadines Les Halles Paris offers a business center with free WIFI comfort, a free newspaper in the lobby, a fitness center, 3 meeting rooms and laundry facilities. Thanks to its ideal location, Citadines Les Halles Paris allows you to visit the sights of the city with all amenities and all the comforts you need to feel at home.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1BR Apartment - 2 twin (single) beds and 1 sofa bed

HotelSolution.name: Le Prince Regent Residence and Spa

Content.hotel:Description: Housed in a luxuriously renovated 18th Century building, Residence & Spa le Prince Regent offers beautiful cotemporary-style apartments and provides high quality services, which fulfil the expectations of the most demanding guests. The property offers a breakfast room, a brand new spa with hammam and indoor swimming pool. The reception is open from 7 a.m. until midnight. Set in one of the most attractive and historic areas of the Left Bank and paralth slel to the noride of the exceptional Luxembourg Garden and the Palais du Luxembourg, this street is in short walking distance to Saint Germain des Prs, the Seine, and to the Quartier Latin. Nearby are the select open-air market of the rue Buci, and the famous Deux Magots and Caf de Flore, both favorite haunts of existentialists and expatriated American literate back in the day. There are elegant boutiques, cinemas, fine restaurants, cafes, and all sorts of convenience shops in the neighborhood. The nearest metro stations are Odeon (line 4 & 10) and Luxembourg (RER B).

PromotionalInfo.customerFulfillmentRequirements: FREE access to the Spa between 10am and 8pm Children under 16 are not allowed in the spa area
PromotionalInfo.shortMarketingText: FREE access to the Spa between 10am and 8pm
PromotionalInfo.termsAndConditions: FREE access to the Spa between 10am and 8pm Children under 16 are not allowed in the spa area

HotelSolution.name: Hotel du Collectionneur Arc de Triomphe Paris

Content.hotel:Description:
Located within comfortable walking distance from the Champs Elysees Avenue, this Art Deco hotel features a spa, fitness centre and on-site parking. Courcelle Metro Station (line 2) is a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Collectionneur includes an LCD TV, minibar and safe. The elegant bathroom is fitted with hairdryer and bathrobe. Private terraces offering views of Paris are available in some rooms. Drinks are served at the Purple bar and traditional French specialties are proposed at the hotel's brasserie restaurant. Executive rooms give access to the Executive Lounge providing free breakfast, day long refreshments and evening cocktails. You can relax at the spa, work out in the fitness room or take a stroll on the Andalusian patio. Parc Monceau is located right in front of the hotel and the Arc de Triomphe is a 10-minute walk from Hotel du Collectionneur. Guest must be at least 18 years old to check-in
SPA is exclusively dedicated to adult (client from 16 years old minimum)

hotel:Amenities.hotel:Amenity: Public areas wheelchair accessible for disabled

PromotionalInfo.customerFulfillmentRequirements: FREE access to the SPA (sauna, hammam and jacuzzi). Children under 16 years old are not allowed to go in the Spa.

PromotionalInfo.termsAndConditions: FREE access to the SPA (sauna, hammam and jacuzzi). Children under 16 years old are not allowed to go in the Spa.

HotelSolution.name: Citadines Apart'hotel Saint Germain des Pres Paris

Content.hotel:Description: Hotel Located in the heart of Paris, this Apart hotel sits on the banks of the Seine opposite the Pont Neuf, and is just a short stroll from Boulevard St Michel. This property offers a fitness center, a conference room, a business center with free internet access, laundry facilities and private parking (20 euros per day). The hotel also offers a reception open 24 hours on 24. The entire residence is non-smoking. The hotel offers 204 units on 7 floors. All units have a bathroom with hairdryer, a kitchen area equipped with stove, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, air conditioning, satellite TV, direct dial telephone, a safe and a free WIFI access. Pets are allowed: 10 euros per animal and per day. Thanks to its ideal location, Citadines Saint Germain des Pres Paris allows you to visit the sights of the city with all amenities and all the comforts you need to feel at home. The area hosts a wide selection of cafes, pubs and restaurants, the receptionists will be happy to recommended some of those for your dining and entertainment needs.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1BR Apartment - 2 twin (single) beds or 2 double beds

Content.hotel:Description: Ideally located in the Latin Quarter of Paris, near the Pantheon and Notre Dame, the residence Villa Daubenton, a member of the Coeur de City is a short walk from the famous Rue Mouffetard in the 5th arrondissement of Paris. On the left bank of Paris, in a charming area, Villa Daubenton is the ideal starting point to discover Paris historical, scientific and modern ... with privileged access to the botanical garden, the Jardin du Luxembourg ... Villa Daubenton has 16 spacious apartments, from studios to 3 rooms, which can accommodate 1 to 6 people with all the comfort and services of a 3 star hotel. In all our apartments, a kitchen or kitchenette is at your disposal. The layout of the apartments is ideal for families. Private parking is located directly in the hotel, it is available on request (surcharge). Do not hesitate to contact our reception team presents to learn. Whether you are present for business or leisure, the team of Villa Daubenton is delighted to welcome you 24h/24 and assist you in organizing your stay there. The residence have an adapted studio for disabled guests: a double bedroom, kitchenette, seating area for 2 people, bathroom. All double beds can be separated into two twins. Sofa-beds are transformable into a double bed for two people. Only apartments for 4 or 6 people have a living room with sofa and balcony. The studios do not have a balcony. A dishwasher has been installed in each apartment for 4 or 6 people (not in the studios). Breakfast is available from 7.30 am to 11.00 am. It must be ordered the day before 4.30 pm. At the check-in we ask our customers the credit card used for payment. If the reservation is supported by the agency, we require a credit card as guarantee.
The new Original Hotel, opening in April 2012, is ideally located in the heart of Paris, close to the Place de la Bastille and the Marais district. It offers 38 rooms, designed in a colorful style.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Quad Room - 2 twin (single) beds or 1 double bed

Content.hotel:Description: Breakfast Included ! In the heart of the golden Triangle of Paris, a small charming and luxurious boutique hotel, with an excellent price-value ratio. Far from home, you will immediately feel just like home. Our professional and international staff, the elegant French style, comfortable and cosy ambiance as well as the privileged location, will make your stay unforgettable.

This hotel has delightful "old-fashioned" atmosphere that once welcomed the English clientele during Paris Belle Epoque. The quests would admire the charm of the waxed wood and the cozy atmosphere in piano-bar. The hotel boasts a stunning position: an exceptional location facing the Louvre on the corner of the Rue Saint Honore, famous for its luxurious windows displays. The hotel also provides free wireless access in rooms, at the reception and in the breakfast room.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Comfort Triple - 1 double bed and bedding varies

PromotionalInfo.shortMarketingText: EXCLUSIVE OFFER Stay 2 nights and save 15%

Content.hotel:Description:
The 2 stars Hotel Richmond is located in front of the Gare du Nord Train Station and the metro station. Hotel offers air-conditionning and Free Wifi. All rooms are equipped with a flat screen TV with satellite channels, direct phone, and bathrooms with shower or bath and hairdryer. Every morning, breakfast is served as a buffet. Guests can buy drinks 24 hours a day from a vending machine. A large range of restaurants can be found within 100 metres of Richmond Hotel.
The property is 2.7 km from the Seine River and le de la Cit, and Place de la Rpublique is 2 km away. Private parking is available nearby.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Triple Room - 3 twin (single) beds or bedding varies

Content.hotel:Description: Located in the heart of the Montparnasse district, this design hotel is just 30 metres from the Raspail Metro stop. The htel Aiglon is located in the heart of Montparnasse, close by many theatres, the Fondation Cartier, the Catacombs and some mythical Parisian brasseries such as La Closerie des Lilas. The area is quiet though central, a few steps from the metro station Raspail. The lounge and breakfast room are decorated in a contemporary manner, mixing light blue, warm plum and bright colors. You will enjoy this decor skimming through one of the numerous art books from the library. The hotel Aiglon manages to create a link between present and attachment to artists and writers from the past. The artists Bunuel and Giacometti used to stay in the hotel. Most of the 46 rooms of the hotel offer clear views. Many of them are renovated according to the 20's style. Bathrooms are decorated with Art Deco mosaics made by the artist Mathilde Jonquire. Guest rooms are modern and stylish with free Wi-Fi access. Parking at cost 28 euros per person and per day. Extra bed at cost 30 euros per person and per day.

Whether the reason for your journey to Paris is business or leisure, the K+K Hotel Cayre offers the style and comfort you deserve. The recently renovated first-class hotel proves to be an urban oasis with high-tech amenities, contemporary design and the knowledge of how to make you feel at home. When you're ready to venture outside, the best of Paris surrounds you. Conveniently located in the heart of the cultural centre of Saint-Germain des Pres, and in proximity to the Latin Quarter, the immediacy of sights, business centers and shopping areas ensures that your stay in Paris will be a pleasurable one. Buffet breakfast is to be booked and paid directly at the hotel (30 euros per person)

hotel:Amenities.hotel:Amenity: Public areas wheelchair accessible for disabled

Content.hotel:Description: The four star First Hotel Paris will delight you as much with its contemporary setting as the amenities provided. Fully renovated, this boutique hotel designed with talent by the interior designer Laurent MANGOUST, is perfect for an idyllic stay in the French capital, just a stone's throw from the Eiffel Tower. Hotel offers a free WIFI connection and room service.

The Hotel Mayfair Paris is an elegant 4 star boutique hotel offering 40 French style decorated rooms & 7 junior suites. Newly refurbished, the Mayfair combines harmonious colours, luxurious fabrics & a very attentive and personalised service. Ideally located in the fashion & business area of Paris, between the two royal places: Place de la Concorde & Place Vendome; it is at walking distance from the Louvre Museum, Opera & Champs-Elyses. The Mayfair is the perfect place for leisure or business trips in Paris.

The Tourville hotel provides charming and elegantly tasteful accommodation and a personalized welcome. The atmosphere is quiet and cozy, just like a family home. Its 30 elegant, air-conditioned rooms are each individually furnished and decorated with paintings, lamps and antique furniture. The warm colors (golden yellow, sand and rose-pink) exude a soft sense of peace and quiet. Other amenities are Airport transfer, Bar, Concierge, Doctor on call, Dry cleaning, Internet access-High-Speed, Internet access-Wireless, Laundry service, Lift / Elevator, Non-smoking rooms, Reception, Room service and Safe deposit box.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Junior Suite - 1 king bed and 1 sofa bed with Air conditioning, Minibar, Coffee/Tea maker

Content.hotel:Description: Art and design enthusiasts will be right at home at the Artus Hotel. At the same time as honoring the memory of great artists of the past, with a large scale reproduction of part of Eugene Delacroix's 1834 painting Femmes d'Alger dans leur apartment in particular, the Artus Hotel also pays tribute to contemporary art. A stone's throw from the main tourist attractions, art galleries and antique shops, this hotel offers serenity in its modern decor and exceptional comfort, with 27 rooms (including one junior suite and one duplex room) on 6 floors. With the Artus, the architect Pierre Seignol boldly succeeded a challenge close to the Maurice Hurand Hotels Group's heart: combining luxury, art, history and modernity. Although similar in their design and all created to be spacious, no two rooms are quite the same. Fine materials, delicate fabrics and unique pieces of art give each one its own personality. Exotic woods are carefully paired with shimmering colors to fill the hotel with warmth and elegance. The carved oak furniture is specially chosen to form a perfect relationship with each room's architecture. The bathrooms, decorated with marble and smooth, exquisite Murano glass will provide you with a perfect area for relaxation. The well-being area has a sauna, cardiovascular training equipment and massages (reservations are required) and is at your disposal throughout your stay. The Artus loves art and regularly renews the temporary exhibitions which fill the hotel, the lobby and the rooms. An original approach: one work from each of the contemporary artists exhibited is purchased by the Artus allowing it build up its dynamic collection. Take your time to admire the works on show... and lose yourself in the art of Paris. The hotel provides also dry cleaning, library, lobby reception and smoke free hotel. The 21 August, discover PLAYTIME. Atmosphere of the Fifties to the new bar of Paris 34 rue de Buci located close to the metro Mabillon. Passport to the Parisian life, PLAYTIME, installed in the intimate setting of the Artus Hotel, offers a menu of contemporary cocktails, relaxed and pointed. It is in a special mood, very much inspired by Jacques Tati films that the Artus Hotel wanted to create a separate space to savor the subtle intoxicating liquor ... The interior design, made by Studio Janrji, PLAYTIME has revisited for the essence of 50 years without any nostalgia for the place and designed furniture lines both round and pure. Dive into the world of deliciously retro Fifties in this cozy bar with 20 seats where the decoration is a subtle blend of humor and sobriety. Between referring to the seventh art and wink to the past, the card comes in 4 axes and choose the mood of the day ... Cocktails, strong acids, or more fresh floral. Undecided? Be seduced by the custom creations of head barman. PLAYTIME heard beyond the simple notion of a bar with its originality and the creative energy of the Saint-Germain-des-Pres. Open daily to hotel guests and 6:00 p.m. to 1:00 a.m. for outside customers. PLAYTIME 34, rue de Buci - 75006 Paris

With 950 rooms with breath-taking views over Paris, two bars and a restaurant, and more than 2,900 square metres of modular meeting rooms, Hotel Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile is a four-star hotel that is among the most high-profile buildings in the capital.
The Hotel Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile is located in Porte Maillot, in the 17th district of Paris. Without a doubt it is the perfect starting point for exploring the French capital, being ideally situated between the la Defense business district and the most beautiful avenue in the world the Champs Elyses. A stay in this hotel will make it possible for you to easily visit the most beautiful attractions in Paris on foot. For longer distances, the metro line is directly accessible from the hotel and crosses Paris from East to West, stopping at some 25 stations.
The hotels luxurious and stylish rooms are spacious, bright and well-appointed with modern amenities and king size or twin beds. On the 30th floor of the hotel, an intimate and refined 110-square-metre (1,184-square-foot) lounge, and a 25-square-metre (269-square-foot) meeting room, Skyline, are available to Club guests from 7am until 11pm. Offering an incredible view over the Sacre-Coeur, this private lounge, designed especially for those who seek excellence is the perfect place to relax and enjoy tailored-made service. The hotel provides 34 modular meeting rooms covering a total of 269 square metres (2,900 square feet) and a capacity to host up to 3,500 people.
Reaching 137 meters in height, with 34 floors, the hotel offers brings you all the emotion and intensity of a breathtaking view overlooking Paris most famous monuments including the Eiffel Tower and the Arc de Triomphe, to name a few.
The hotel is directly connected to the Palais des Congres of Paris, one of the largest convention centres in Europe, including a shopping centre.
The Bar "La Vue" located at the 34th floor offer an impressive open air theatre looking out onto the world's mo

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Deluxe Room - 2 twin (single) beds or 1 king bed

Content.hotel:Description: A magnificent Haussmanian building is home to this lovely Townhouse hotel, located in perfect setting in the heart of Paris on the majestic Opera Boulevard with a sublime view of the Garnier Opera House, just steps away from Place Vendomeand right neart to the Louvre and Palais Royal. Walking distance to the Grands Boulevards and their department stores. Airport transfer at cost, Bar, Business center, Concierge, Concierge, Concierge, Doctor on call, Doctor on call, Gym / Fitness facilities, Gym / Fitness facilities, Internet access-Wireless, Internet access-Wireless, Internet access-Wireless, Lobby, Lobby, Pets allowed, Pets allowed, Room service, Safe deposit box and Safe deposit box. Cancellation Policy : 12h day before and no 24h. All Additional beds on request. Breakfast is available at cost : 35 Euros par person per night.
